


# vanilla sdk

https://docs.ton.org/v3/guidelines/ton-connect/frameworks/web

pnpm add @tonconnect/sdk
pnpm add @tonconnect/ui


# react sdk

https://docs.ton.org/v3/guidelines/ton-connect/frameworks/react


pnpm add @tonconnect/ui-react



```js
<TonConnectUIProvider manifestUrl="https://trc404web.pages.dev/tonconnect-manifest.json">
            
</TonConnectUIProvider>

```




# data structure

tonConnect
 - connected=true/false
 - account 
   - address:"0:004375fc2d9dea9b09c881a5f0832b169c104113c4f6e86f01e22438f8f1c318"
   - chain:"-3"
   - publicKey:"12b6d5785345cbe5b227820528be12b32c5e122ed33d85394e5e8e9ebb435ec1"
   - walletStateInit: ""
 - modalState
 - wallet
   - appName:"tonkeeper"
   - (emit)
